name: Save Yourself, Princess!
description:
SAVE YOURSELF, PRINCESS!

This is a game where you are an abducted Princess, taken by a big red dragon, but your kingdom unfortunately has no prince and no knight in shining armour to save you, so you have to save yourself!

This is a Choose Your Own Adventure styled game with very simplistic mechanics and is fully text-based. This was created as a test run and a game made as a project to learn the layout of Unity and C#.
